changelog: v1.5.12: Eve Santos (E.V.E.) is live — 404 popup, pyttsx3 voice, /api/eve/fix, Eve commit style.
changes: NEW: Eve Santos (E.V.E — Error Vigilance Engine) — BugWatcher now has a full persona with voice, personality, and style
NEW: Eve 404 popup in dashboard — glassmorphism bubble with pink shield avatar, slides in on any /api/ 404, 5-min cooldown
NEW: POST /api/eve/fix — logs 404s to logs/bugs/eve_reported.jsonl, triggers pyttsx3 voice locally
NEW: pyttsx3 voice in bugwatcher.py — Eve speaks on startup, bug received, fixed, escalated, CI events (silenced by CI=true)
NEW: Eve's commit messages — 'Fixed it 💕 NSIS path was dragging. You're welcome. — Eve'
NEW: Eve's daily standup format — printed in her voice at 23:55 local time
NEW: docs/eve.md — full persona, voice trigger table, commit style, standup format, API reference
